Hi all,

 I was testing to see if Squad fixed the engines not firing after having been inside fairings bug. 

I seem to have discovered their way around it. Or it could just be a bug. 

 Anytime a separator is connected to a faring base when it is separated the fairing is automatically released too. Can anyone confirm this? 

Also, I discovered a heating bug. I will post a video so you can see what is happening and try to recreate it. 

Parts are overheating on the pad and exploding. It seems to only happen when the fairings are used like in the video.

 Maybe someone can test too. I am using no mods.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/DdS4E-pFVbM?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Well, I haven't found any bugs yet, but I see a misspelling in your post:

1.03, instead of 1.0.3. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I found a major bug. Engine exhaust no longer causes heating damage to parts.

See more here: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/126311-1-0-3-Heating-oversight](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/126311-1-0-3-Heating-oversight)

Even 16 staged seperatrons faced directly at a structural panel cannot even raise its temperature by a hair.

I also found that the little square heat panels cause lag-spikes in the editor.
Moved to Support (unmodded installs).
I find it hilarious these updates designed to fix bugs create more than they solve.

I honestly could write a novel on this. It goes for everything beyond .90

Version 1.0.0 up to now is just a continuation of beta. Adding in many new untested systems. Yet having the nerve to call it the full game. Even with squad now admitting that they were rushed on time to make the full release. It is kind of silly. We should still be in beta right now. Version 1 should have been .95 to actually test all these new systems.

I have the same issue, unmodded KSP via Steam, I didn't even know there was an update until it loaded. I have a major mission with 5 kerbals most of the way to Duna. When I reverted to an earlier save (with the ship on the ground at Minimus) the ship was there but Minimus had disappeared. I have seen other posts with this issue but not a way to fix it.
